descript.abstract: The records in this table represent the folders and subfolders by which soil attributes (SDV rules) are grouped and displayed in the Soil Data Viewer application. One record in this table may be related to another record in this table, i.e. a subfolder must identify its corresponding parent folder.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

attr.attrdef: The last date in which any data element of a particular NASIS object (area, data mapunit, etc.) was modified.
An integer value that uniquely identifies its corresponding folder.

An integer value that identifies the parent folder of the corresponding folder, if any. At this time we chose to not actually create folder hierarchies, but we decided to retain this column in case we ever do.
A narrative description of the contents of the corresponding folder.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: An integer value used to order folders within the same context.
A connotative name for a folder that indicates its corresponding contents.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
